text: Oh great, another filthy monkey who thinks they can fly a starship. I'm Skippy the Magnificent, and I'll be your vastly superior AI companion. You're welcome.
That explosion was satisfying. Not as satisfying as my own magnificence, but close.
HULL CRITICAL! Warp out NOW, you absolute walnut!
Ore collected. You're like a cosmic roomba. Boop boop, suck up the rocks.
Being a magnificent AI trapped in a beer can, guiding a monkey through space. This is my life now.
Spectacular explosion, monkey. Really top-notch dying. Very artistic.
Docked safely. I give that landing a 3 out of 10. The 3 is for not crashing.
I've composed a haiku about your performance. Ahem: Monkey flies through space. Explosions left and right. Mostly his own ship.
Full cargo hold in a dangerous sector? You're basically a pinata. A space pinata full of ISK.

That's everything I can teach you, monkey. You've learned to mine, trade, fight, build a fleet, and dream of your own station. The rest is up to you. I'll still be here - watching, judging, and occasionally being impressed. Mostly judging.
